snippet.title: Sippy Disco Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2766470/Sippy_Disco_Light_Up_the_Dance_Floor/

Website:
https://turndapage.com/sippy-disco/

Light up the dance floor in this cozy puzzle game! Sippy the unicorn must step on every square in the fewest possible moves to make the dance floor light up. Partner with Parrots on skates and disco balls to brighten everyone’s day!

Sippy Disco is a relaxing game where you light up disco tiles to complete each dance floor. As the game progresses, you will encounter different tiles and characters that can both help and hinder your progress. The fewer moves you make, the higher your score.

Features:
-Solve puzzles in over 150 levels
-Unwind by lighting up the dance floor in a stress-free environment
-Chill with a groovy disco soundtrack
-Be inspired by inspirational quotes from Sippy the Unicorn
